title: MGM Cartoon Christmas
brief_description: 35 minutes of MGM christmas cartoons including: ALIAS ST. NICK; a cynical mouse doesn’t believe in Santa Clause: THE PUPS’ CHRISTMAS; two puppies have some fun playing with Christmas gifts: THE PEACHY COBBLER; a poor shoemaker feeds his last piece of bread to some birds who pay him back by fixing all the shoes in his shop: PEACE ON EARTH; the 1939 Oscar nominated parable directed by Hugh Harman features tiny animals recounting how men have annihilated themselves with war.
